name: VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry (Base Pack)
name_original: VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry (Base Pack)
description:
Train your professional skills in GWPro VR trainings safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

Training consists of 3 modes: Study, Training, Exam that provide step-by-step control of all VR activities. Voice-over and visual guides included.

VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry was developed for professionals by professionals (including NEBOSH certified HSE). It is suitable for a wide variety of workers.

Join our community of VR training that makes industries safer and better place
